I find graph.stop() will stop Dstream,then close KafkaConsumer,but JobGenerator.eventLoop has not stopped,so error occured.
item.summary: Error generating jobs when Stopping JobGenerator gracefully

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: tdas should the order of these two stops be reversed? the comment on stopping the event loop suggests it needs to happen 'first', also.
The issue is still exists, submitted PR in order to fix it.
